Name: Ficket: 追剧引擎
About the game: Ficket is software that focuses on aggregating various similar information. You can use ficket as a customized browser or search engine to save time when surfing the Internet. You can customize it, or rely on the steam workshop to put together websites of the same type you like to browse The Early Access version is currently available, and the functions currently implemented include: 1. The user can customize the rules/import the list of rules through the URL 2. After configuring the rules, users can search for videos on related websites 3. The user can select the video 4. Users can jump to the target website for video browsing 5. The user can bookmark the video and jump from the homepage
